Text: The Original Astro Boy:  The series was based mostly on the 1963 Astro Boy anime series, but begun to include elements from the 1980 series in later issues.

<Text: The Original Astro Boy:  The comic went through three writers and artists, and embellished the original plotline, despite only covering the first episode of the 1963 series.>
